title: Bangladesh Wins T20 Series Against India
description: Bangladesh clinched the T20 series in a thrilling match against India, winning by 5 wickets.

title: New Tech Hub Launched in Dhaka
description: A state-of-the-art tech park has opened in Dhaka with over 50 startups ready to operate.

title: Flood Situation Improves in Northern Regions
description: Water levels are receding in flood-hit areas, and relief work continues steadily.

title: SSC Results 2025 Published
description: Education Board has published SSC 2025 results with a pass rate of 85.6%.

title: Eid-ul-Adha Celebrated Peacefully Across the Country
description: Millions of Muslims in Bangladesh celebrated Eid-ul-Adha with joy and prayers.

title: Metro Rail Expansion Gets Green Light
description: Government has approved the second phase of metro rail expansion covering more areas of Dhaka.
